title: Murder by Contract (restored, with intro and outro) (1958, film noir, imdb score: 7.2)

sources.title: Murder By Contract 1958 Restored Movie 720p
sources.description: Murder by Contract is a 1958 American film noir crime film directed by Irving Lerner . Academy Award -nominated screenwriter Ben Maddow did uncredited work on the film. Centering on an existentialist hit man assigned to kill a woman, the film is often praised for its spare style and peculiar sense of cool . The film has exerted an influence on American cinema , most notably on director Martin Scorsese , who famously cited Murder by Contract as "the film that has influenced [him] most."
